metadata.Title: CVE-2021-46244 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: A Divide By Zero vulnerability exists in HDF5 v1.13.1-1 vis the functionH5T__complete_copy () at /hdf5/src/H5T.c. This vulnerability causes anaritmetic exception, leading to a Denial of Service (DoS).

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
insighttoolkit4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
kissplice: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
paraview: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
vtk package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
vtk6 package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
xdmf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
